Tejas,

It's quite likely that folks will want enough details to reproduce the problem. 

My guess would be that EMF2DOMAdapterImpl is passing in null for the Notifier, which is not supported.
Yes, please provide more info including steps on how to reproduce.

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP resolved bugs from the 1.0.x and 1.5.0 timeframe.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.

Thanks, John Lanuti
